parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a new site. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is considered deprecated and is no longer supported</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> type '''createSite''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> -

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[deleteSite]], [[allSites]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on February 18, 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Strangepete|Strangepete]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
''"CreateSite is an obsolete command from the time in development when Sites were handled separately from other modules. Now they use the modules framework.''<br>
''If you want a specific Site to be activated during the mission, place it in the editor and use the Condition line in its parameters (the last one)."'' - Jezuro [http://forums.bistudio.com/showthread.php?148841-How-do-we-use-quot-createSite-quot&p=2441414&viewfull=1#post2441414]
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
